name: oh-my-codex (Yeachan-Heo)
description: [项目级] OmX - Oh My Codex: Power tools for OpenAI Codex CLI。来源: https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-codex

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
OmX - Oh My Codex: Power tools for OpenAI Codex CLI

来源: https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-codex
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 668

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
- `~/.codex/prompts/` (30 prompt files)
- `~/.agents/skills/` (40 skills)
- `~/.codex/config.toml` updates:
  - `notify = ["node", "..."]`
  - `model_reasoning_effort = "high"`
  - `developer_instructions = "..."`
  - `[features] multi_agent = true, child_agents_md = true`
  - MCP server entries (`omx_state`, `omx_memory`, `omx_code_intel`, `omx_trace`)
  - `[tui] status_line`
- Project `AGENTS.md`
- `.omx/` runtime directories and HUD config

name: oh-my-codex/skills 模块
description: [模块级] oh-my-codex 项目的 skills 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/Yeachan-Heo/oh-my-codex

genes.title: skills 模块说明
genes.content:
- Prompts: `prompts/*.md` (installed to `~/.codex/prompts/`)
- Skills: `skills/*/SKILL.md` (installed to `~/.agents/skills/`)

Examples:
- Agents: `architect`, `planner`, `executor`, `debugger`, `verifier`, `security-reviewer`
- `deep-executor` is deprecated; use `executor` for complex implementation tasks.
- Skills: `autopilot`, `plan`, `team`, `ralph`, `ultrawork`, `ultrapilot`, `research`, `cancel`
